forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. West wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. Southwest wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the sun is making a determined appearance this afternoon, casting a warm glow over the city with temperatures hovering around a pleasant 60 degrees. As the day wears on, those temperatures will gently dip to a cozy 57, inviting urban explorers to take advantage of the daylight. The crisp air carries a hint of tranquility, with a light west wind fluttering at around six miles per hour, making it easy to breathe in the fresh energies of the season.

As twilight approaches and the city transitions into evening, a veil of mostly clear skies will cradle San Francisco, with the mercury settling into a cool 46. The gentle southwest winds will accompany the night, whispering promises of a peaceful rest. Given such delightful weather, a stroll through the vibrant streets might beckon. Perhaps a stop at a local café, where one can relish a warm drink while watching the world pass by, might be in order. A light jacket would suffice against the evening chill, allowing you to embrace the unfolding night comfortably.
